ovdesc.p: This copies AM.DYNAMIC.MODEL records to a different date and/or node name.

desc.p: If selected, will overwrite any AM.DYNAMIC.MODEL records which exist with the same id (i.e. NEW.MODEL*TO.DATE), otherwise, will only create nodes that do not already exist on the TO.DATE.
Date to which the AM Dynamic Model is to be copied.
Together with the NEW.MODEL field, specifies the AM.DYNAMIC.MODEL id to copy to.
Node name of the AM Dynamic Model we wish to create.
Must be a valid AM.DYNAMIC.NODE.NAME id. This is defaulted to the DYNAMIC.MODEL being copied, and must match it if the COPY.TYPE has been set to 'Single'.
Date from which the AM Dynamic Model is to be copied.
Together with the DYNAMIC.MODEL field, specifies the AM.DYNAMIC.MODEL id to copy from.
This field can be set to All, Single, Parent or Child:
All: This is the default setting. Copy this node and all connected nodes.
Parent: Copy this node, the parent nodes connected to it and all parent nodes up to the root node(s).
Child: Copy this node and all nodes that appear below this node in the structure.
Alphanumeric key of up to 30 characters.
Node name of the AM Dynamic Model to be copied.
This is a mandatory field and must be a valid AM.DYNAMIC.NODE.NAME id.
Override messages created during record input.
